gov.va.med.srcalc.security

Class AccessVerifyAuthenticationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.security.VistaAuthenticationProvider
      • gov.va.med.srcalc.security.AccessVerifyAuthenticationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider

    public final class AccessVerifyAuthenticationProvider
extends VistaAuthenticationProvider

    An AuthenticationProvider implementation that authenticates a user based on a VistA access/verify code pair.

    Authentication is performed using a VistaAuthenticator, so this class is essentially an Adapter (Gang-of-Four Design Pattern) from VistaAuthenticator to the Spring Security AuthenticationProvider interface.

    See Also:
    VistaAuthenticator.authenticateViaAccessVerify(String, String, String)

      • authenticate

        protected org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authenticate(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication providedAuth,
                                                            SrcalcWebAuthnDetails authDetails)
                                                                 throws org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException
        Authenticates the user given an access and verify code pair.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in class VistaAuthenticationProvider
        Parameters:
        providedAuth - contains the access code as the principal and the verify code as the credentials
        authDetails - an SrcalcWebAuthnDetails indicating a known division
        Returns:
        A fully-populated UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken if authentication succeeds
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException - if authentication fails
